pkgmetadata.longdescription: Model Wrappers for Multi-Level Models // Bindings for hierarchical regression models for use with the 'parsnip' package. Models include longitudinal generalized linear models (Liang and Zeger, 1986) doi:10.1093/biomet/73.1.13, and mixed- effect models (Pinheiro and Bates) doi:10.1007/978-1-4419-0318-1_1.
